context: What do you know about John Lasseter? Would I like his movies?
John Lasseter wrote Toy Story 2 and it is starring Wayne Knight.
I know Toy Story series. Is it the one with Tom Hanks?
Im not sure but I think Andrew Stanton is. and he also wrote WALL-E. WALL-E is starring Pete Docter
I see, seems like Walt Disney movie. Do you know when it was released?
I don't have that information, but if you are into Disney Movies you will like The Shaggy Dog.
Oh, never heard about this one. Is it a comedy?
resp: Yes it is. it's starring Tim Allen who also played In Toy Story 2.
